snippet: Officials in Athens were moving to approve raft of new laws and decisions demanded by foreign creditors in exchange for more aid.
abstract: Greece moves to approve raft of new laws and decisions demanded by foreign creditors in exchange for more aid.
lead_paragraph: Officials in Athens were moving to approve raft of new laws and decisions demanded by foreign creditors in exchange for more aid.

headline.seo: Greece Hurries to Make Deep Cuts Before Meeting
headline.main: Ahead of Summit, Greece Rushes to Approve New Cuts
headline.print_headline: Greece Presses Ahead With Deep Cuts
